entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:52 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 2:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: ENE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Snow or ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Clearing in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the morning then west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
